key_drivers: US military strikes on Iran (Feb 28) driving geopolitical risk spike - VIX +6.6%, MOVE +14.79% - supporting gold and JPY safe havens
Falling real yields (DFII10 1.74%, down 6bps over 5 days) providing structural support for gold, silver, and rate-sensitive tech
Massive EIA crude inventory build (+16M bbls week ending Feb 20) bearish for crude oil despite Iran geopolitical risk premium

fallbacks_used: VIX intraday from Investing.com VX futures (+4.02%) to confirm CBOE Feb 27 close of 19.86
